Contrast¶

This module contains function to evaluate the contrast of an image using either RMS contrast or Michelson contrast.

@author: Giulio Gabrieli

contrast.contrast_Michelson(img)¶

This function evaluates the Michelson contrast of an image:

Parameters:

img (numpy.ndarray) – image to analyze, in RGB

Returns:

Michelson contrast

Return type:

float

contrast.contrast_RMS(img)¶

This function evaluates the RMS contrast of an image:

Parameters:

img (numpy.ndarray) – image to analyze, in RGB

Returns:

RMS contrast

Return type:

float

contrast.sRGB2RGB(img)¶

this function converts a sRGB img to linear RGB values.

It loops through each pixel, and apply a conversion to pass from sRGB to linear RGB value.

Parameters:

img (numpy.ndarray) – image to analyze, in sRGB

Returns:

image to analyze, in RGB

Rtyipe:

numpy.ndarray
